title: Procedural Language Skill Training Course Based on Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Language Structures and Possession of Elementary Conversational Skills
context.additional_context: Conducting simulation activities using tablets/smartphones in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic conversational procedures (greetings-questions-responses-thanks) with 90% accuracy in role-play simulations
Learners can generate dialogues utilizing appropriate grammatical structures with over 80% accuracy in virtual scenario-based games
Learners can reproduce language procedures applicable to real-world contexts with over 75% participation in group simulation assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
